rows.label: tlk41700121_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Superbia and Invidia...
When those two go to war, there's no doubt
Gula will be caught in the middle.

rows.label: tlk41700121_05_msg0002
rows.name:
But Gula itself has no power to fight.
We'll simply be ruled by the victorious nation.

rows.label: tlk41700121_05_msg0003
rows.name:
All we can do is pray that the winner won't let
Gula's civilization be trampled.

rows.label: tlk41700121_05_msg0004
rows.name:
The best thing would be for this war to never happen,
and for things to stay as they are...
